name: Hard Blow
overview: Hard Blow is a boxing game that allows the player to create and customize his own boxer and them help him to be the World Champion. To do that he have to choose carefully each week training to improve his boxer stats and after that choose who will be his next opponent in order to climb in the ranking. To training is the usual in a boxing game: Running, weightlighting, punching ball, etc. The fights are difficult to win, specially since the game doesn't show how much energy is left in the player's character or the opponent, but the movement are well done, and for sure is a challenging game.
